text: avvidham, ninne namearu samudayattilekk dutanayi niyeagiccirikkunnu. itinumumpum niravadhi samudayannal kalinnupeayittunt. nam ninakku beadhanamayi nalkiya sandesam niyavarkk vayiccukelppikkan ventiyanit. avarea, dayaparanaya daivatte tallipparayunnu. parayuka: avananenre nathan! avanallate daivamilla. nan avanil bharamelpiccirikkunnu. enre tiriccupeakkum avanilekkutanne
